alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 7:43PM CDT until June 04 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern York County in east central Nebraska... Northeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Central Merrick County in central Nebraska... Southwestern Polk County in east central Nebraska... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hordville to Central City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hordville around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Polk and Marquette. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
